views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11.0 till 12.1.2 (Tested on iOS 11.3.1, iOS 11.4.1 and iOS 12.1)

This tweak makes your Control Center a nice and different look!

With this tweak, you can add translucent blur to all modules background.

Works with all tweaks who calls change modules size or add the modules to Control Center.

Configure options from Settings.

Note: Set the Blur Level from 0.00 - 2.00 if you donâ€™t want to make the slight lag (The slight lag is due to the blur, not a bug!).

If this package doesn't work or have any issues on your iDevice, feel free to contact me via Twitter.

Show your some love by donation

Enjoy!


See larger Screenshots below.

Add iOS 12 Support! in version 1.2-1 :
- Add options to Settings app
- Add Blur Level on Setting's the tweak on the Settings app

in version 1.2-5 :
- Fixed turning on the tweak when turning off the Enabled button

More features on the way.
